channel.title: Representation Learning on Michal Znalezniak
channel.description: Recent content in Representation Learning on Michal Znalezniak

item.title: Contrastive Hierarchical Clustering
item.description: In this post, I would like to introduce you to CoHiClust, a Contrastive Hierarchical Clustering model based on deep neural networks, which can be applied to typical image data. CoHiClust distills the base network into a binary tree without access to any labeled data. CoHiClust outperforms the established and popular Agglomerative Clustering and generates a hierarchical structure of clusters consistent with human intuition and image semantics. You can access the full paper of CoHiClust by clicking here.
